00034 /* define the glue between control and SetActuatorsFromCommands */
00035 #define actuators actuators_pwm_values
00036 #define SERVOS_TICS_OF_USEC(_v) (_v)
00037 #define ESC_STOPPED SERVOS_TICS_OF_USEC(0)
00038 
00039 #ifndef KILL_MOTORS
00040 #define ESC_HOVER   SERVOS_TICS_OF_USEC(5500)
00041 #else
00042 #define ESC_HOVER   SERVOS_TICS_OF_USEC(0)
00043 #endif
00044

00047 #define ActuatorsCommit  actuators_pwm_commit
00048 
00049 int32_t actuators_pwm_values[ACTUATORS_PWM_NB];
